title: Custom upper case C in Crate and Barrel logo?
content:
Is the C in Crate and Barrel also from Helvetica? The C in the logo looks like it was cut out of a perfect circle, but neither the O nor C take this shape in Helvetica or Helvetica Neue. Or is that part custom?

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/5/51/CrateandBarrelLogo.s...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611192153/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/5/51/CrateandBarrelLogo.svg/141px-CrateandBarrelLogo.svg.png "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/5/51/CrateandBarrelLogo.svg/141px-CrateandBarrelLogo.svg.png")
author: chimerical

comments.content: I've always assumed the "C" was [ITC Avant Garde Demi](http://web.archive.org/web/20120611192153/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-avant-garde-gothic/demi/).
The ends of the stroke in C seem to leave a tighter gap in the Crate and Barrel logo, though ITC Avant Garde Demi does look very close. Thanks!
